Package http.server.modules.header

Class ResponseHttpHeader

java.lang.Object
http.server.modules.header.HttpHeader
http.server.modules.header.ResponseHttpHeader
public class ResponseHttpHeader extends HttpHeader
Daughter class of HttpHeader. This class purpose is to represent the response header. Only a subgroup of HttpStatusCode are implemented.

    • write

      public void write(OutputStream outputStream)
      This method write the header onto the outputStream. After this method the body can be written onto the outputStream.
      Parameters:
      outputStream - the output stream.
